description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================================================================

### Title and Reference

* **Title (English)**: Multiple Victoria Class Spares: O-Rings, Seals, and Anti-Flash Devices
* **Title (French)**: Plusieurs Pièces de Rechange de Classe Victoria: Joints Toriques, Bagues d’Étanchéité et Dispositifs Anti-Flash
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01017664
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-230351/B

### Tender Summary

The Department of National Defence seeks to acquire multiple spares for Victoria Class vessels, including O-Rings, Seals, and Anti-Flash Devices. The tender is open for submission and closes on February 15, 2023, at 14:00 EST.

### Items to be Delivered

The following items are required:

* 5 EA of SEAL, PLAIN (Part No.: 55249, NCAGE: K0080, Part No.: SM1M1932-10, NCAGE: K0640) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* 5 EA of SEAL, PLAIN (Part No.: 55249, NCAGE: K0080, Part No.: SM1M1932-10, NCAGE: K0640) to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* 1 EA of ANTI-FLASH DEVICE (Part No.: MX/00025/SL/003/2, NCAGE: K6451, Part No.: MX/00025/SL/003, NCAGE: K6451, Part No.: MX/00025/SL/003SHEET 2, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt

### Bidding Requirements

Bidders must indicate the brand name and model, or Part Number, and NCAGE of the equivalent or substitute product being offered. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Contact and Documents

For more information, please contact:

* Mr. Darrell Hill, Department of National Defence, [darrell.hill@forces.gc.ca](mailto:darrell.hill@forces.gc.ca)

The tender documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website at the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/21/c0def4b3bec07045aec297e1b2413a0
